Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #201 Central/Ridge Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Church/Benson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Maple, Emerson, Elgin and Chicago: due to, a festival near Church/Benson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Maple, Emerson, Elgin, Chicago and over regular route: due to, a festival near Church/Benson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/36th
ShortDescription: #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Pershing, Wallace, 35th, due to a police activity near Halsted/36th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Pershing, Wallace, 35th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to a police activity near Halsted/36th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 75th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: #4 Cottage Grove buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 75th, King Drive and Marquette, due to localized flooding near 75th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 75th, King Drive and Marquette, due to localized flooding near 75th/Greenwood

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
